subject: Re: Quote Request for 3 Items - URGENT
body:
Thank you for your urgent inquiry. We understand the time-sensitive nature of your request and will prioritize your quote accordingly.

We have received your inquiry about the following products: Widget Pro, Tool Kit, Premium Widget.

To provide you with an accurate quote, we need some additional information: missing quantity for premium widget

We will provide your quote within 12 hours. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at sales@acme.com.
questions: What quantity of Premium Widget do you need?
closing:
Best regards,

Acme Corp Sales Team
sales@acme.com
